scripts.install-all: cd ADMIN && npm install && cd .. && cd Backend && npm install && cd .. && cd CropShield && npm install && cd .. && cd FARMERS && npm install && cd .. && cd SCIENTIST && npm install && cd DiseasePrediction && pip install -r requirement.txt
scripts.run-all: cd ADMIN && npm start && cd .. && cd Backend && npm start && cd .. && cd CropShield && npx react-native run-android && cd .. && cd FARMERS && npm start && cd .. && cd SCIENTIST && npm start && cd DiseasePrediction && python manage.py runserver
